title: File for Guaranteed Service Refund
description: A shipment booked with a 'Guaranteed by 10 AM' service was delivered late. The company is entitled to a full refund.

tasks.description: The system receives the delivery confirmation from the carrier, noting the delivery time was 11:30 AM.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system captures the actual delivery time.

tasks.description: The system compares the actual delivery time to the guaranteed time and flags a 'Service Failure'.
tasks.expected_outcome: An alert is created for the service failure.

tasks.description: An agent submits a 'Guaranteed Service Failure' claim to the carrier to have the freight charges refunded.
tasks.expected_outcome: A claim is filed to recover the shipping costs.
